channel.title: Need a Team of experienced staff !READ! Will get paid
channel.description:
Not sure if there was a section for this but if there is please delete it or move it:D
Alright so heres the scoop I just found a source I wanted along with its client ive always wanted a server I do not know how to code(Ima dumb ass loll) and am in need of some staff. Heres the deal I need the Following x2 Experienced coders x1 Experienced Website developer x1 Web client +Client hoster If anyone is interested let me know Once the server is started up and a donation flow is running ill buy a vps for the server. Each of the team will get 10m on Runescape a month or 10$ through Paypal if your interested let me know Hotmail Prothugy@hotmail.com or Pm me On here thanks:D

item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Sorry, I should of been more clear earlier. Please take a look at this topic and change your topic layout accordingly. Also, since offering rewards is against our rules, I’ll have to ask you to remove that bit. You can still offer the reward or whatever, but we don’t want anything to do with it, so keep it off these forums.

Read full topic
